title: Spooky Scary Fiddlesticks?
body:
I doubt that they'll make a skin for this year's Harrowing, but I had a thought for a new Fiddlesticks skin. I know he just had a Risen skin, but it didn't appeal that much to me, not to mention he hasn't received a VU since forever (but that's a rant for another time).

So imagine Fiddlesticks as a skeleton, holding a skeletal leg for a weapon, and his abilities accompany with the skin:

Terrify: The terrify icon will change into a shaking skull icon.
Drain: A tunnel of bones
Dark Wind: Randomly throwing bones or a skull.
Crowstorm: BOOOOONESTOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOORM!!! (Guess that reference)

So yeah, that's my idea for a Fiddlesticks skin. Just hope Riot gives Fiddlesticks a Visual Update soon because his classic skin and lore are so outdated.

replies.body:
Wont happen. EVER.

Can't have skeletons in the game because the Chinese find it offensive. Thus why Karthus' rework removed his skull face in some skins.
